name: Tetris Case Opening Simulator
description:
This game was made for 19th Mini Jam, where the theme was "Mysteries" and the limitation was "Your game must combine two, or more different game genres" !

This game combines Tetris and case opening, left and right arrow to control. Your goal is to build highest tower possible, ultimately block the gift supply. 

Sooooo, my ambitions killed me on that one. Excuse me for lack of sound, animation and/or content. I hope this can compensate <3:
